mapper.select: select d.money,d.realid,d.tendid,b.item longtime,d.BEGINTIME,to_char(add_months(d.BEGINTIME,b.item),'yyyy/MM/dd') as duedate,d.stuts,((b.item/12)*0.12*d.money+d.money) mo,((b.item/12)*0.12*d.money+d.money-d.returnmoney) as actual from TB_LOANRECORD d join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM b on d.LONGTIME=b.id where d.realid=#{realId}
select count(*) from tb_borrow where release=2
